After shooting fire onto the opponent, Tobi uses his [[gunbai]] to strengthen the flames, which creates a vortex of fire that knocks them into the air.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', [[Boruto]] is able to replicate this jutsu using the [[Shinobi Gauntlet]]. Instead of using a gunbai, he uses a [[Scientific Ninja Tool: Ever-Changing|technologically advanced shuriken]] containing a Wind Release ninjutsu.
